Column.Name: TRIM Link to RFT or EOI Approval by Steering Committee
Principal Place of Business within City
Business Sources Goods and Services from City
Company Sponsors Community or Sporting Events within City
Company Employs Peoples with Disability within City
Business Number Type
Column.Formula: IF( [Business Number Type] = NULL(), DB_LOOKUP( "Business Number Type", "Settings - Vendor", HASH("Default Business Number Type", TRUE) ), [Business Number Type] )

Column.Name: Business Number Check Supported
Column.Formula: DB_LOOKUP( "RecordID", "Settings - Vendor", "[RecordID] = 1 AND [Business Number Type] = " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT([Business Number Type]) & " AND [Validation Supported] = TRUE AND [BusinessNumber Check Enabled] = TRUE" ) <> NULL

Column.Name: Has Social Factors Record
Column.Formula: IF( AND( [RecordID]>0, [Navigation] = "Social Factors"), EBMS_GET_CHILD_RECORD_COUNT([EFormType], [RecordID], "Social Factors")>0, [Has Social Factors Record] )

Column.Name: New Offer
Column.ValidationFormula:
IF( $thisValue == NULL, "New offer cannot be empty",
$thisValue = [Offer], "New offer price cannot be same as current offer price" )

Column.Name: Parent Structure

RaiseLinkedEForm.Description: API Request - Prepare an API request (if doc is stored on GTM)

FormulaCriterion.Formula: HASH_GET(ARRAY_INDEX([Document Data], [Document Data - Display Index]), "Provided via Sourcing") = TRUE

TriggerCustomEvent.EventArgumentsFormula: HASH( "Request Source", ARRAY(EFormType, RecordID), "Request Type", "Get Document (GoToMarket)", "Run as User", [Procurement Officer], "Opportunity ID", [Sourcing ID], "Response ID", HASH_GET(ARRAY_INDEX([Document Data], [Document Data - Display Index]), "Response ID"), "Document ID", HASH_GET(ARRAY_INDEX([Document Data], [Document Data - Display Index]), "Document ID") )
TriggerCustomEvent.Description: Get Document (GoToMarket) - Send API Request to GTM

FormulaCriterion.Formula: HASH_GET(ARRAY_INDEX([Document Data], [Document Data - Display Index]), "Provided via Sourcing") = TRUE

Navigate.Description: Download file based on return information from API Request

FormulaCriterion.Formula: AND( [API Request Return Value] <> NULL, ISERROR([API Request Return Value]) <> TRUE, HASH_GET(ARRAY_INDEX([Document Data], [Document Data - Display Index]), "Provided via Sourcing") = TRUE )
HASH_GET(ARRAY_INDEX([Document Data], [Document Data - Display Index]), "Provided via Sourcing") <> TRUE

DisplayMessage.Description: Not found - [API Request Return Value] = NULL

FormulaCriterion.Formula: AND(HASH_GET(ARRAY_INDEX([Document Data], [Document Data - Display Index]), "Provided via Sourcing") = TRUE , OR( [API Request Return Value] = NULL, ISERROR([API Request Return Value]) = TRUE))

Binding.Expression: "<style> .coreDocument {" & IF([Enable Removing Documents] = TRUE, "width: 534px;") & " } </style>"
[Company Name] & " (" & [VPR ID] & ")"

RichLabel.Text:
<style>
.coreDocumentHidden {
  background; #d8d8d8; 
  color: #404040;
}
.coreDocument:hover {
  color: #00557A;
}
.coreDocument {
  overflow: hidden;
  text-overflow: ellipsis;
  line-height: 28px;
  white-space: nowrap;
  background: white;
  border: 1px solid #e0e0e0;
  font-size: 10pt;
  padding-left: 4px;
  cursor: pointer;
}
</style>

RaiseLinkedEForm.Description: API Request - Prepare an API request (if doc is stored on GTM)

FormulaCriterion.Formula: HASH_GET(ARRAY_INDEX([Document Data], [Document Data - Display Index]), "Provided via Sourcing") = TRUE

TriggerCustomEvent.EventArgumentsFormula: HASH( "Request Source", ARRAY(EFormType, RecordID), "Request Type", "Get Document (GoToMarket)", "Run as User", [Procurement Officer], "Opportunity ID", [Sourcing ID], "Response ID", HASH_GET(ARRAY_INDEX([Document Data], [Document Data - Display Index]), "Response ID"), "Document ID", HASH_GET(ARRAY_INDEX([Document Data], [Document Data - Display Index]), "Document ID") )

HASH_GET(ARRAY_INDEX([Document Data], [Document Data - Display Index]), "Provided via Sourcing") <> TRUE

Binding.Expression: OR( [Document - Action] = "Filter", AND( HASH_GET(ARRAY_INDEX([Document Data], [Document Data - Display Index]), "File Name") <> NULL, [Manually Logging Response Details] <> TRUE, ARRAY_INDEXOF([Visible Steps], "Review Responses") > 0, EACH [Respondent] <> ARRAY(), [Selected Response Line] = NULL ) )

Label.Text: Select a team(s), choose whether to allocate or unallocate, then click the applicable document to make that allocation.

Binding.Expression: [Document - Action] = "Filter"
AND( [Document Data - Display Index] <> NULL, [Document - Action] = NULL, HASH_GET(ARRAY_INDEX([Document Data], [Document Data - Display Index]), "Document Status") != "Hidden" )
ARRAY_LENGTH([Document Allocation - Teams]) > 0
ARRAY_LENGTH([Document Allocation - Teams]) > 0
AND( [Document - Action] = "Bulk Assign", HASH_GET(ARRAY_INDEX([Document Data], [Document Data - Display Index]), "Document Status") != "Hidden" )
[Document Allocation - Team - Filter] <> NULL
AND( HASH_GET(ARRAY_INDEX([Document Data], [Document Data - Display Index]), "Document Status") != "Hidden", [Document - Action] = "Filter" )
[Document Allocation - Team - Filter] <> NULL
HASH_GET(ARRAY_INDEX([Document Data], 1), "Document Status") == "Hidden"

Binding.Expression: HASH_GET(ARRAY_INDEX([Document Data], [Document Data - Display Index]), "Document Status") = "Hidden"
AND( HASH_GET(ARRAY_INDEX([Document Data], 1), "Document Status") != "Hidden", [Document Data - Display Index] <> NULL )

FormulaCriterion.Formula: FALSE

FieldEntry.LineNumberFormula: HASH_GET(ARRAY_INDEX([Document Data], [Document Data - Display Index]), "Respondent Source Line")

Binding.Expression: AND( [Document Data - Display Index] <> NULL, [Enable Removing Documents] = TRUE )

[Document Data - Display Index] <> NULL
AND( ARRAY_LENGTH([Document Data]) > 0, [Document Allocation - Team - Filter] <> NULL, ARRAY_LENGTH([Document Data - Filtered Matches]) = 0, [Document Data - Display Index] = NULL )

FormulaCriterion.Formula: FALSE

RefreshControl.Description: Refresh the upload documents button (the document count specifically)

Information.Text: Clicking this button will toggle a 'Remove' option to appear against each document. Removing documents cannot be undone
Clicking this button will toggle a 'Remove' option to appear against each document. Removing documents cannot be undone

Binding.Expression: [Adding Documents] <> TRUE

TriggerCustomEvent.EventArgumentsFormula:
HASH( "Requester", ROLE(EBMS_GET_CURRENT_USER()),
"Response ID", [VP Response ID],
"Response Name", [Company Name],
"Response UUID", [VPR ID],
"Respondent RecordID", [RecordID],
"Evaluation RecordID", [Evaluation RecordID] )
TriggerCustomEvent.Description: Zip Up Response Files (Pull in docs from remote system)

Binding.Expression: AND( [Document Data - Display Index] <> NULL, [Selected Response Line] <> NULL, OR( ARRAY_INDEXOF([User to Group Mappings], "GTM SSO Users") > 0, ARRAY_INDEXOF([User to Group Mappings], "System Builders") > 0 ) )
[Document Data - Display Index] <> NULL

ClosePopupTask.ResultFormula: HASH( "onCloseEvent", "Get Paged Documents", "data", HASH( "Force Document Refresh", [Change Made] == TRUE ) )

Binding.Expression: "Respondent: " & [Company Name]
HASH_GET([Parent Structure], "Breadcrumb")
[RecordID] > 0
DB_LOOKUPALL( "Business Number Type", "Settings - Vendor", "[Business Number Type] IS NOT EMPTY" )
[Business Number Check Supported] = TRUE
IF( [Respondent Status] = "Awarded", "#dafcd8", "#F6F6F6" )

Information.WindowContent: Working relationship, good to work with, etc.
Experience on similar projects. Met deadlines, advised of delays in timely manner, legitimate reasons for delays etc.

Information.Text: Did they have the required work force & machinery

TextCriterion.Text: CASE WHEN [Value] = TRUE THEN 'Yes' WHEN [Value] = FALSE THEN 'No' ELSE 'Not Provided' END

Binding.Expression: [Has Social Factors Record] = TRUE

FormulaDrivenRaiseLinkedEForm.FieldValuesFormula: HASH( "Vendor Name", [Company Name], "Vendor RecordID", [Vendor RecordID], "Respondent RecordID", [RecordID] )

Binding.Expression: [Has Social Factors Record] <> TRUE

Label.Text: Enter all the information in the Company Details block and click Register to create a Vendor Record.
This respondent is not linked to a Vendor record in the system. You can register this as a Vendor or link to an existing Vendor record if one exists.

Binding.Expression: [Existing Vendor RecordID] = NULL()

Label.Text: This will assume the information on the Vendor record is up to date and the information on this record will updated to match the details on the Vendor record.
This respondent is not linked to a Vendor record in the system. You can register this as a Vendor or link to an existing Vendor record if one exists.

Binding.Expression: HASH_GET([Parent Structure], "Breadcrumb")
[RecordID] > 0
DB_LOOKUPALL( "Business Number Type", "Settings - Vendor", "[Business Number Type] IS NOT EMPTY" )
[Business Number Check Supported] = TRUE
AND( ARRAY_INDEXOF([User to Group Mappings], "System Builders") > 0, [Navigation] = "Details" )
[Company Name]
[VPR ID]

Label.Text: New prices are to be entered as Tax EXCLUSIVE

Binding.Expression: [Evaluation Status] = "Finished"
[View Price Change History] != TRUE
[Price Change Notes] = NULL
[View Price Change History] == TRUE
[Company Name] & " (" & [VPR ID] & ")"

RichLabel.Text:
<html>
<head>
	<title></title>
</head>
<body>
<style type="text/css">/* CSS talk bubble */
.talk-bubble {
	margin: 40px;
  display: inline-block;
  position: relative;
	width: 200px;
	height: auto;
	background-color: lightyellow;
}
.border{
  border: 8px solid #666;
}
.round{
  border-radius: 30px;
	-webkit-border-radius: 30px;
	-moz-border-radius: 30px;

}

/* Right triangle placed top left flush. */
.tri-right.border.left-top:before {
	content: ' ';
	position: absolute;
	width: 0;
	height: 0;
  left: -40px;
	right: auto;
  top: -8px;
	bottom: auto;
	border: 32px solid;
	border-color: #666 transparent transparent transparent;
}
.tri-right.left-top:after{
	content: ' ';
	position: absolute;
	width: 0;
	height: 0;
  left: -20px;
	right: auto;
  top: 0px;
	bottom: auto;
	border: 22px solid;
	border-color: lightyellow transparent transparent transparent;
}

/* Right triangle, left side slightly down */
.tri-right.border.left-in:before {
	content: ' ';
	position: absolute;
	width: 0;
	height: 0;
  left: -40px;
	right: auto;
  top: 30px;
	bottom: auto;
	border: 20px solid;
	border-color: #666 #666 transparent transparent;
}
.tri-right.left-in:after{
	content: ' ';
	position: absolute;
	width: 0;
	height: 0;
  left: -20px;
	right: auto;
  top: 38px;
	bottom: auto;
	border: 12px solid;
	border-color: lightyellow lightyellow transparent transparent;
}

/*Right triangle, placed bottom left side slightly in*/
.tri-right.border.btm-left:before {
	content: ' ';
	position: absolute;
	width: 0;
	height: 0;
	left: -8px;
  right: auto;
  top: auto;
	bottom: -40px;
	border: 32px solid;
	border-color: transparent transparent transparent #666;
}
.tri-right.btm-left:after{
	content: ' ';
	position: absolute;
	width: 0;
	height: 0;
	left: 0px;
  right: auto;
  top: auto;
	bottom: -20px;
	border: 22px solid;
	border-color: transparent transparent transparent lightyellow;
}

/*Right triangle, placed bottom left side slightly in*/
.tri-right.border.btm-left-in:before {
	content: ' ';
	position: absolute;
	width: 0;
	height: 0;
	left: 30px;
  right: auto;
  top: auto;
	bottom: -40px;
	border: 20px solid;
	border-color: #666 transparent transparent #666;
}
.tri-right.btm-left-in:after{
	content: ' ';
	position: absolute;
	width: 0;
	height: 0;
	left: 38px;
  right: auto;
  top: auto;
	bottom: -20px;
	border: 12px solid;
	border-color: lightyellow transparent transparent lightyellow;
}

/*Right triangle, placed bottom right side slightly in*/
.tri-right.border.btm-right-in:before {
	content: ' ';
	position: absolute;
	width: 0;
	height: 0;
  left: auto;
	right: 30px;
	bottom: -40px;
	border: 20px solid;
	border-color: #666 #666 transparent transparent;
}
.tri-right.btm-right-in:after{
	content: ' ';
	position: absolute;
	width: 0;
	height: 0;
  left: auto;
	right: 38px;
	bottom: -20px;
	border: 12px solid;
	border-color: lightyellow lightyellow transparent transparent;
}
/*
	left: -8px;
  right: auto;
  top: auto;
	bottom: -40px;
	border: 32px solid;
	border-color: transparent transparent transparent #666;
	left: 0px;
  right: auto;
  top: auto;
	bottom: -20px;
	border: 22px solid;
	border-color: transparent transparent transparent lightyellow;

/*Right triangle, placed bottom right side slightly in*/
.tri-right.border.btm-right:before {
	content: ' ';
	position: absolute;
	width: 0;
	height: 0;
  left: auto;
	right: -8px;
	bottom: -40px;
	border: 20px solid;
	border-color: #666 #666 transparent transparent;
}
.tri-right.btm-right:after{
	content: ' ';
	position: absolute;
	width: 0;
	height: 0;
  left: auto;
	right: 0px;
	bottom: -20px;
	border: 12px solid;
	border-color: lightyellow lightyellow transparent transparent;
}

/* Right triangle, right side slightly down*/
.tri-right.border.right-in:before {
	content: ' ';
	position: absolute;
	width: 0;
	height: 0;
  left: auto;
	right: -40px;
  top: 30px;
	bottom: auto;
	border: 20px solid;
	border-color: #666 transparent transparent #666;
}
.tri-right.right-in:after{
	content: ' ';
	position: absolute;
	width: 0;
	height: 0;
  left: auto;
	right: -20px;
  top: 38px;
	bottom: auto;
	border: 12px solid;
	border-color: lightyellow transparent transparent lightyellow;
}

/* Right triangle placed top right flush. */
.tri-right.border.right-top:before {
	content: ' ';
	position: absolute;
	width: 0;
	height: 0;
  left: auto;
	right: -40px;
  top: -8px;
	bottom: auto;
	border: 32px solid;
	border-color: #666 transparent transparent transparent;
}
.tri-right.right-top:after{
	content: ' ';
	position: absolute;
	width: 0;
	height: 0;
  left: auto;
	right: -20px;
  top: 0px;
	bottom: auto;
	border: 20px solid;
	border-color: lightyellow transparent transparent transparent;
}

/* talk bubble contents */
.talktext{
  padding: 1em;
	text-align: left;
  line-height: 1.5em;
}
.talktext p{
  /* remove webkit p margins */
  -webkit-margin-before: 0em;
  -webkit-margin-after: 0em;
}
</style>
</body>
</html>

ChangeFieldValues.Description: Updates the notes field and clear the input box

Binding.Expression: HASH_GET([Current User Permissions], "write") = FALSE
HASH_GET([Current User Permissions], "write") = FALSE
[Notes] = NULL

ClosePopupTask.ResultFormula: HASH( "onCloseEvent", "Inject Into Respondent Data", "data", HASH( "Count of Notes", [Count of Notes], "Response ID", [RecordID] ) )

Binding.Expression: HASH_GET([Current User Permissions], "write") = FALSE
FALSE/*EBMS_IS_USER_IN_ROLE( EBMS_GET_CURRENT_USER(), "System Builders" )*/

FormulaCriterion.Formula: $landedView = "Assign Documents"
$landedView = "File Notes"

AttachFiles.Description: Attach Respondent PDF and its attachments

MoveAttachments.Description: Copy files to eProcure Responses folder in Procurement

RecordFile.RecordIDFormula:
DB_LOOKUP( "RecordID", "Mail Merge Template", "[LineNumber] FAST_EQUAL_TO 1 AND [Reference] = 'Unsuccessful Letter Template' AND [Context EFormType] = "&DB_ENCODECONSTANT([EFormType])
)

FormulaCriterion.Formula: [Awarded] <> TRUE

RecordFile.RecordIDFormula:
DB_LOOKUP( "RecordID", "Mail Merge Template", "[LineNumber] FAST_EQUAL_TO 1 AND [Reference] = 'Successful Letter Template' AND [Context EFormType] = "&DB_ENCODECONSTANT([EFormType])
)

FormulaCriterion.Formula: [Awarded]= TRUE

FieldEntry.Formula: DB_LOOKUPALL( ARRAY( "Team Name", "Team UUID" ), "Evaluation", "[RecordID] = " & [Evaluation RecordID] & " AND [Team UUID] <> NULL" )

LET $dataSet := COALESCE( [Document Data - Filtered Matches], [Document Data] );
RETURN IF( HASH_GET($eventargs, "Keep Location") = TRUE, [Document Data - Display Page],
HASH_GET($eventargs, "Reset") = TRUE, 1,
HASH_GET($eventargs, "Navigation") = "Next", CEILING(LEAST( [Document Data - Display Page] + 1, ARRAY_LENGTH($dataSet) / 10 )),
HASH_GET($eventargs, "Navigation") = "Previous", CEILING(GREATEST( [Document Data - Display Page] - 1, 1 )),
CEILING(COALESCE([Document Data - Display Page], 1)) )
ARRAY_SELECT( EACH [Document Data - Display Index], $(i, item) HASH_GET(ARRAY_INDEX([Document Data], $item), "Assigned Teams") )

IF( OR( [Business Number Type] = "ABN", [Business Number Type] = "ACN" ), HASH_GET([ABR Data], "Entity Name") <> "",
[Valid BusinessNumber] )

IF( OR( [Business Number Type] = "ABN", [Business Number Type] = "ACN" ), NOW(),
[Date BusinessNumber Checked] )

Event.Name: Unassign Teams from Documents
Event.Description: Accepts HASH("TeamUUIDs to Remove", ARRAY(<Team UUIDS>)), and will remove all document assignments for any teams provided.
